text:
(ENCHANTER) You quickly adopt the mind-set necessary to cast this simple spell. A voice speaks to you from the astral world where faltyns dwell.

["I prefer not to enter your mortal plane just at the moment," says the faltyn quaveringly. "There will be no charge for having called upon me, of course."]

choices.text: Berate the faltyn for its disobedience in not answering your summons
You think it prudent to leave this chamber at once
